public method Parser::Context::Strings::add (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in add: 10
sub add {
  my $self = shift; return if scalar(@_) == 0;
  my $data = $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}};
  $self->SUPER::add(@_);
  my %D = (@_);
  foreach my $x (keys %D) {
    $data->{uc($x)} = {alias => $x, hidden => 1}
      unless $data->{$x}{caseSensitive} || uc($x) eq $x;
  }
}
public method Parser::Context::Strings::addToken (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in addToken: 7
sub addToken {
  my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
  my $data = $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}}{$token};
  return if $data->{hidden};
  my $field = (($data->{caseSensitive} || uc($token) eq lc($token)) ? "tokens" : "caseInsensitive");
  $self->{$field}{$token} = $self->{tokenType};
}
public method Parser::Context::Strings::clear (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in clear: 5
sub clear {
  my $self = shift;
  $self->{caseInsensitive} = {}; $self->{patterns} = {};
  $self->SUPER::clear(@_);
}
public method Parser::Context::Strings::copy (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:

# Number of lines of code in copy: 5
sub copy {
  my $self = shift; my $orig = shift;
  $self->SUPER::copy($orig);
  $self->{caseInsensitive} = {%{$orig->{caseInsensitive}}};
}

public method Parser::Context::Strings::init (  ) 

Undocumented Method

# Number of lines of code in init: 10
sub init {
  my $self = shift;
  $self->{dataName} = 'strings';
  $self->{name} = 'string';
  $self->{Name} = 'String';
  $self->{namePattern} = qr/[\S ]+/;
  $self->{tokenType} = 'str';
  $self->{precedence} = -5;
  $self->{caseInsensitive} = {};
}
public method Parser::Context::Strings::removeToken (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in removeToken: 7
sub removeToken {
  my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
  my $data = $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}}{$token};
  return if $data->{hidden};
  my $field = (($data->{caseSensitive} || uc($token) eq lc($token)) ? "tokens" : "caseInsensitive");
  delete $self->{$field}{$token};
}
public method Parser::Context::Strings::update (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in update: 9
sub update {
  my $self = shift;
  my @strings = keys %{$self->{caseInsensitive}};
  if (@strings) {
    my $pattern = '(?i)(?:'.Parser::Context::getPattern(@strings).')';
    $self->{patterns} = {$pattern => [$self->{precedence},$self->{tokenType}]};
  }
  $self->SUPER::update;
}
